code: import React from'react';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import'./Navbar.css';import logo from'./logo.png';import{useLanguage}from'./LanguageContext';import{translations}from'./translations';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const{language,switchLanguage}=useLanguage();const t=translations[language];const handleLanguageChange=()=>{const newLang=language==='en'?'hi':'en';switchLanguage(newLang);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"app-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"brand-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Delhi Metro Project Logo",className:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"brand-name",children:t.brandName})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"main-nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/",exact:true,activeClassName:"active-link",children:t.navHome}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/upload-rfp",activeClassName:"active-link",children:t.navUpload}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/browse-rfps",activeClassName:"active-link",children:t.navBrowse})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header-actions",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"action-btn lang-btn",onClick:handleLanguageChange,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{role:"img","aria-label":"language",children:"\uD83C\uDDE6"})," ",t.langButton]})})]});};export default Navbar;
